title: Punisher - Over the Edge [BBN][h33t]
description:
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/3310/overtheedge1tm6.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8008/overtheedge2zp1.png[/IMG]

Story Arc Includes:
01 - War Zone 41 - Countdown 2
02 - The Punisher 104 - Countdown 1
03 - War Journal 80 - Countdown 0
04 - Double Edge - Alpha
05 - Daredevil 344
06 - Doctor Strange - Sorcerer Supreme 81
07 - Ghost Rider 65
08 - The Incredible Hulk 433
09 - Double Edge - Omega
10 - The Incredible Hulk 434

[quote]This is rather interesting story arc about The Punisher out for vengence.  It starts with the Countdown issues 2, 1, and 0 which concluded 3 main Punisher series. For some reason The Punisher thinks that it was Nick Fury that killed his family which lead The Punisher on his out for justice man hunt.

The story begins with Double Edge Alpha, Tie-ins in Daredevil, Dr Strange, The Incredible Hulk, and Ghost Rider have "Over the Edge" imprint so that&#039;s why they are there. I don&#039;t know of any other tie-ins related to the story arc. I sorted them in one order but I think it&#039;s not crucial in which order are they read. For example Dr Strange has only four-five pages that involve Nick Fury and it&#039;s a part of another Dr Strange arc. It ends in Double Edge Omega but the last Hulk issue is added like some sort of aftermath although it doesn&#039;t have the imprint.[/quote]


BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!
